data.what_is:
ContactPigeon is an award-winning Customer Data Platform that gives a solution to every retailer's problem: How to send the right message, at the right time, with the right content to each visitor. It enables one-person-shops and enterprise retailers alike to benefit from the use of a Big Data platform, in order to easily create data-driven Automations and Personalized Campaigns that react to customer/visitor behaviors and catalog changes in seconds. 

That's why ContactPigeon helps customers by addressing three major goals towards growing their sales:

* Enriched customer insights: Collecting customer behavior data and building an enriched unified view of customers

* Improved customer engagements: Trigger automated and predictive messages at the right moment within a customer's journey for optimizing sales conversion and retention.

* Multi-channel reach: Allow businesses to design engaging campaigns across a wide range of messaging channels (e.g. email, SMS, Viber, mobile, push notifications, website, Facebook, Google, postcards) within one platform.
data.product_description:
ContactPigeon captures, analyzes, and integrates customer interactions across all sources for deep insights into customer behaviors - online and offline. The insights can then be used to generate hyper-personalized marketing campaigns across supported messaging channels, including digital channels (e.g. email, push notifications, in-site messages, landing pages, and SMS/Viber/WhatsApp) and physical channels (e.g. postcards, 2-way QR codes, Cisco's access points).

The tech platform offers 4 primary capabilities:

- Data integration, synchronization, and insights

- Omni-channel messaging

- AI-driven recommendations & personalization

- Scalable automations

ContactPigeon's clients also receive ongoing customer success consultation. Such services aim (1) to facilitate accelerated customers' learning and adoption of the platform, and (2) educate on marketing best practices needed for client teams to achieve specific growth goals.ContactPigeon is one of the few unified solutions, combining capabilities in consumer insights, omnichannel marketing automation, and predictive algorithms. This inclusive, patented technology offers businesses a consolidated view of customer interactions, and effectively allows them to use these insights in their marketing campaigns.ContactPigeon exceeds the competition in the following ways:1. Designed specifically with retail and eCommerce customers in mind, most of ContactPigeon's features are tailored for this sector. Many of the competitors' solutions are more generic, requiring further customizations or workarounds for their verticals.2. With hands-on onboarding and support experience, each account has an assigned customer success consultant and an onboarding sales engineer. We take the time to actively provide feedback on the account's integration and growth on a monthly basis.3. Our proprietary platform allows retailers to link customer interactions and behavior between physical stores and online presence, resolving the common challenge of understanding how customers shift between channels.
